text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Neither Mayano nor Akebono have<n>arrived yet...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
They haven't retired from the race<n>either... I wonder if
something<n>happened to them.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Wait... Don't tell me you used the<n>slide on—

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Non non! I certainly did not, Air<n>Groove!

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Right now, those two are discovering<n>their own beauty... It's
nothing more<n>than that. ♪
Several hours earlier...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: One, two! One, two!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Air Groove's stopped chasing after<n>me, so I must really be
in the lead!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Once I get my very own wedding<n>dress, everyone's gonna
swoon over<n>me! ♪

text_block_list.name: Handsome Guy
text_block_list.text:
What beauty! I've never seen such a<n>captivating
Umamusume before!

text_block_list.name: Sexy Lady
text_block_list.text: Such beauty, such grace... I wish I<n>could be like yooouuu! ♪

text_block_list.name: Popular Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Uh-huh! No one has more mature<n>charm than Mayano Top
Gun, that's<n>for sure!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ooh! I'm such a catch! ♪

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
...Just kidding! I'd better hurry to the<n>goal if I want to make
my dream come<n>true!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Eek! What's with the suspension<n>bridge?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: If I were to fall from this height, I'd be<n>in a world of pain...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
But I have to cross it! I've gotta be<n>brave and charming like
real,<n>grown-up women are!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hup! Hah!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe. ♪ This is kinda fun now that<n>I've gotten used to it!
It's just like an<n>obstacle course!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
All right! Time to take off and soar all<n>the way to the chapel!
☆
...YAAA!
MAYAAA!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Huh? That voice... Bono?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I thought I heard her voice, but I don't<n>see her... Bono!
Where are you?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Down here! Below the bridge!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Below? Wait, are you on the cliff?!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Ow, ow, ow. Thank goodness you<n>noticed me.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Oh no, Bono! What are you doing<n>down there?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
I slipped and twisted my ankle... I was<n>sure I'd be able to
just climb right<n>back up, but...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Maya, when you get to the chapel,<n>could you get them to
send a medical<n>team over?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Huh? But if I do that you'll—

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Yeah... I'll have to retire from the race.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
But there's no way around it. I can't<n>possibly reach the
goal like this.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: But...

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Ring-a-ding-dong. ☆ I have a halftime<n>announcement for my
beautiful<n>gemstones out there. ♪

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
At present, Mayano Top Gun is<n>closest to the finish line,
with Air<n>Groove following close behind!

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
I hope you're all going to make a très<n>bien effort not to lose
to the two of<n>them! Adieu. ♪

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I'm in the lead...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
That's amazing, Maya! At this rate,<n>you'll be made a muse
for sure!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: So... you can't stop now, right?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: But, but... Bono!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Don't worry about me. I'll be fine!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
But I'll be extra buono if you become<n>a muse for the two of
us. ♪

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
(If I reach the chapel first, Ms. Beauty<n>will definitely
acknowledge me. I'll be<n>able to wear a wedding dress and
get<n>closer to becoming a real lady.)

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: (But Bono's aiming for the same<n>thing...)

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
(I bet she wants to become a muse<n>and wear a wedding
dress too...)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha! You two sure are fired up for<n>this. I'll have to give it
my all too!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
It would be so buono if we could all<n>run in wedding dresses
together! ♪

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: (Ohhh! I don't know what to do!)
